body:
Would you like me to mention your e-mail address explicitly in the commit
message? (This will make it visible to the public).

Otherwise I'm just going to say:

"Inconsistency identified by Anmol Sethi (aubble@github)."

- gri

On Tue, Aug 4, 2015 at 1:44 PM, aubble <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Anmol Sethi and my email is anmol@aubble.com
>
